item.title: How to send duplicate RemoteWrite metrics
item.description: When working with metrics, you may want to send the metrics you’ve collected to 2 different prometheus instances for backup. item.title: Align div to the bottom of the page in 3 steps
item.description: Aligning an element at the bottom of the page is a very common issue in web development and css. You will find the best practices for aligning the div at the bottom of the page. item.title: How to create a sliding menu bar
item.description: In this tutorial, I will show you how to create a sliding left panel easily using css and javascript only. <div class="container"> <div class="slider open">Left Panel</div> <button class="toggle-button" onclick="toggleSlider()">< Close</button> </div> <script> function toggleSlider () { var slider = document.querySelector('.slider') var buttonSlider = document.querySelector('.toggle-button') if (!slider.classList.contains('open')){ slider.classList.add('open') buttonSlider.innerHTML = '< Close' } else { slider.classList.remove('open') buttonSlider.innerHTML = '> Open' } } </script> <style> .container{ position: relative; width: 400px; height: 400px; background: #145677; } .

item.title: Introduction to Docker
item.description: Docker is a new open-source project that makes deployment of applications easier. The idea of this technology is very simple : “the application runs inside a software container.
